Prior to joining SLS Venture in 2004, Mikael Mortensen was CFO at Melacure Therapeutics AB, a position he held between 2001 and 2004. During that period, Mortensen, in addition to his regular CFO duties, also built up and implemented an advanced controlling and internal reporting system for Group Management and the Board of Directors.

Before that, Mortensen held the position as acting Group Controller and Financial Manager at SchlumbergerSema (acquired by WM-data), where he was responsible for consolidating fifteen Nordic subsidiaries and financial reporting to the Groupâ€™s UK headquarters.
